== Elements ==

You can use the `cols` attribute on the following elements:

  * [DivElement <div>]
  * [FramesetElement <frameset>]
  * [MulticolElement <multicol>]
  * [PreElement <pre>]
  * [TableElement <table>]
  * [TextareaElement <textarea>]
